eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A FIRE WARNING FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Crook, WY; AT 11:46 AM ON SEP 07, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 01:46 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: All residents in proximity to 104 Kanode Rd, there is a threat of fire.  Structure fire spreading. Be in SET status and evacuate if you feel you need to, but be prepared to leave at moments notice.  Be aware of Fire vehicles in area.  DO NOT CALL 9 1 1 unless emergency.   Followup messages may come.
